name: io.github.m2ai-mcp-servers/notion-mcp
description: Notion Integration MCP server providing AI assistants with full access to Notion workspaces. Enables Claude to search, read, create, and update pages, databases, and blocks.

required.name: NOTION_API_KEY
required.description: Notion Internal Integration Token from https://www.notion.so/my-integrations

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search across all pages and databases by keyword or title

tools.name: get_page
tools.description: Retrieve a page's properties and metadata

tools.name: create_page
tools.description: Create a new page in a database or as child of another page

tools.name: update_page
tools.description: Update a page's properties (not content blocks)

tools.name: get_page_content
tools.description: Retrieve all content blocks from a page

tools.name: append_blocks
tools.description: Add new content blocks to a page (supports markdown)

tools.name: query_database
tools.description: Query a database with filters and sorts

tools.name: create_database
tools.description: Create a new database as child of a page

tools.name: list_users
tools.description: List all users in the workspace

tools.name: get_user
tools.description: Get details about a specific user
